member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.ExtenderControlBaseDesigner`1
member.summary: Designer support for adding and navigating to page methods

The designer here has two main jobs:
1) Modifying the properties of the TargetProperties objects to remove the "TargetControlID" property and add the Control converter. We remove "TargetControlID" because the value will be hanging off of the target control's properties already so it's confusing/redundant. 2) Modifying the name of the Extender property so it's user-configurable.

member.name: F:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.ExtenderControlBaseDesigner`1.DisableDesignerFeaturesUnknown
member.summary: Orcas implements their own extender designer features, so in that case we disable ours.

member.summary: Called to check if we can extend a given control. We return true if the control has the same ID a our extender control target.

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.ExtenderControlBaseDesigner`1.ExtenderPropertyName
member.summary:
The name of the ExtenderProperty that will appear in the properties of potential target controls.
By default this is the name of the Extender (e.g. "TextBoxWatermarkExtender") but can be customized by overriding this property.

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase
member.summary:
This is the main class for extenders. It has several main jobs:
1) It performs the hookup between an Extender (server) control and the behavior it instantiates 2) It manages interacting with the ScriptManager to get the right scripts loaded 3) It adds some debugging features like ValidationScript and ScriptPath

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase.LocalResolveUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Resolves Url of file.
member.returns: Resolved Url.

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase.EnsureScripts
member.summary: Walks the various script types and prepares to notify the ScriptManager to load them. 1) Required scripts such as ASP.NET AJAX Scripts or other components 2) Scripts for this Extender/Behavior

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.ExtenderControlBase.FindControlHelper(System.String)
member.summary:
This helper automates locating a control by ID.
It calls FindControl on the NamingContainer, then the Page. If that fails, it fires the resolve event.
member.param: The ID of the control to find

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.TreeView.Tree
member.summary:
A hierarical control can be used to display tree of nodes.
The OboutTree control supports the following features,
Node population using databinding from various datasources.
Asynchronous node population on demand
Drag and Drop Support
Key board and RTL Support
Editing Support
Key board and RTL Support
Additional node data can be attached to nodes
Best performance support

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute
member.summary: The PageMethodSignature attribute is used by Designer classes for Toolkit components that include web services. It decorates a delegate that describes the signature of the web method. The ExtenderControlBaseDesigner will automatically add a DesignerActionItem for each of the page methods on the component.

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Friendly name of the page method

member.name: M:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Friendly name of the page method

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.FriendlyName
member.summary: Friendly name of the page method displayed in the designer

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.ServicePathProperty
member.summary: Name of the ServicePath property (to verify that the component isn't using a non-page method)

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.ServiceMethodProperty
member.summary: Name of the ServiceMethod property which will be used to set the name of the page method, or navigate/repair an existing page method

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.UseContextKeyProperty
member.summary: Name of the UseContextKey property (which will be set to true if specified). The corresponding contextKey parameter should be included with the signature but will not be set on the extender.
member.remarks: A few components in the Toolkit have an optional second signature to support using a ContextKey property. Ideally they would have had the ContextKey property from the beginning, but we didn't want to break existing customers. This should not be used by most components.

member.name: P:Obout.Ajax.UI.Design.PageMethodSignatureAttribute.IncludeContextParameter
member.summary: Whether the UseContextKeyProperty has been specified

member.name: T:Obout.Ajax.UI.ClientPropertyNameAttribute
member.summary: Allows the mapping of a property declared in managed code to a property declared in client script. For example, if the client script property is named "handle" and you prefer the name on the TargetProperties object to be "Handle", you would apply this attribute with the value "handle."

For more WAV file format information visit www.wotsit.org. If you have a WAV file that can't be read by this class, email it to the NAudio project and we will probably fix this reader to support it
